comments.content: — VOLT experience needed ... Oh man, I was _so_ close.
Blub :-(

Si, I’ve been outside of the American job market for awhile. What sort of level position is a Program Manager? Does a Program Manager manage projects, or co-ordinate a team of co-workers, too? Thanks!

Microsoft has a pretty specific definition for program manager, but within my group PMs manage projects for internal customers (like Office, Zune, etc.,) consult and advise on typographic issues company-wide and define strategy, specs and for fonts for Window. The PM’s don’t have any full time employees reporting to them but they do manage work completed by vendors and contractors.

I wonder how many people from ahem are applying.
